BR_text.BRsummary: Navigation: Counts not readable on small screens or when count is too large
BR_text.BRdescription:
When the height of the windows is less than the height of the left menu, some numbers are cut and are not readable at 100%
 Firefox Browser 83.0 (64 bit)
 Tested on the demo website and on the latest docker release
